long_description: With a steel frame and a geometry meant for gravel races and cyclocross, the Raleigh Tamland 1.0 Bike is designed for long rides in harsh conditions. Reynolds 520 chromoly frame offers great stability and strength as well as the reliably smooth ride quality that steel is known for. Double-butted tubing, long chainstays and low bottom bracket offer great handling at high speed in gravel. FSA Gossamer crankset is outfitted with 50/34 chainrings for just-right 'cross gearing. Shimano 105 shifters and derailleurs supply solid shifting performance. TRP Spyre mechanical disc brakes with 160mm rotors offer sure stopping in any conditions. Highly puncture-resistant Clement XPlor tires provide exceptional bite for muddy endeavors. Specs on the Raleigh Tamland 1.0 Bike are subject to change; pedals sold separately.
short_description: With a steel frame and a geometry meant for gravel races and cyclocross, the Raleigh Tamland 1.0 Bike is designed for long rides in harsh conditions.
